response.overview: After the liberation of Buchenwald, images of children who survived the Nazi concentration camp went around the world. There were over 900 children, many over them under 14 â€“ a rare exception in the murderous camp system. These children only survived because someone in Buchenwald was protecting them from the terror of the SS. Someone in a position of power and authority in the camp. But who?
response.title: Buchenwald - Heldenmythos und Lagerwirklichkeit
